judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Parker and Stearns, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam
The decree of the Court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Richards.
Costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam

attorneys: Douglass D. Storey, of Storey & Bailey, with him John E. Moody, for appellant.
Maurice R. Metzger, of Metzger & Wicker sham, with him E. Le Roy Keen, for appellees.
